wikipedia_page.main: Littleton Powys (23 January 1771 – 22 January 1842) was an English first-class cricketer who was active in the 1800s playing for Surrey. He is recorded in one first-class match in 1801, totalling 13 runs with a highest score of 10.Powys was born in Lilford Park, Northamptonshire, and died at Thrapston, Northamptonshire, aged 71.

response: Sir Littleton Powys FRS (1647?– 16 March 1732) was a Justice of the King's Bench.
